titleStmt.title: Iniunctions geven by the Quenes Maiestie anno Domini MD.LIX., the fyrst yeare of the raigne of our Soueraigne Lady Quene Elizabeth.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1558-1603 : Elizabeth I)
